channel.title: Change client back ground!
channel.description:
Okay so, I have my client right. I try to change the png background for it and when I move another image to the client folder, the client does not recognize it after I compile and run my client... Is there some more editing to be done when you move a png file to your client folder when you are trying to change the background???
thanks :D

item.title: Change client back ground!
item.dc:creator: @Veng4lyfe Veng4lyfe
item.description:
@Veng4lyfe wrote:

yeah but my way is alot easier just takes abit longer

Read full topic

item.title: Change client back ground!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Sharpshooter… U can change it… I made custom backgrounds and titleboxes for my client a lot… Currently doing in-game images too… They MUST be the same pixel size and name as the old background tho… Up to the very last capital letter… And MUST be png format…

Read full topic

item.title: Change client back ground!
item.dc:creator: @sharpshooter829 sharpshooter829
item.description:
@sharpshooter829 wrote:

hey thanks, some how i just right click edited it lol i wish I would have know that along time ago before I tried to replace it with another png image I made! thanks man :DDD

Read full topic

item.title: Change client back ground!
item.dc:creator: @Veng4lyfe Veng4lyfe
item.description:
@Veng4lyfe wrote:

[quote=“sharpshooter829, post:1, topic:282978”]Okay so, I have my client right. I try to change the png background for it and when I move another image to the client folder, the client does not recognize it after I compile and run my client… Is there some more editing to be done when you move a png file to your client folder when you are trying to change the background???

thanks :D[/quote]

Sharpshooter you do not move another pgn image in the folder the only way you can change the background client would be to right click the image and edit it with paint or whatever to what you want it to be

Imking~

Read full topic
